Title: Prom Dates
Produced by:
Kevin Hart 
 Jeremy Garelick 
 Will Phelps 
 Molle DeBartolo 
 Bryan Smiley 
 Luke Kelly-Clyne 
 Mickey Liddell 
 Pete Shilaimon
Starring:
Julia Lester 
 Antonia Gentry 
 JT Neal 
 Jordan Buhat 
 Zión Moreno 
 Terry Hu 
 John Michael Higgins 
 Chelsea Handler
Production companies:
Hartbeat Productions 
 American High 
 LD Entertainment
Production: American High, Hartbeat Productions,  and LD Entertainment produced the film. Prom Dates began production in Syracuse, New York in 2023. In November 2023, Hulu bought the right to distribute the film. On March 11, 2024, a preview for the film was released.
Release: The film will be released on May 3, 2024, through Hulu.
